info.title: Lacrosse
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. Lacrosse

externalDocs.description: After you've been given an API key and secret, enter it below and "Get" the method you'd like to try out.  Fill in the parameters with what you'd like to try, or use the built in defaults, and click "Try It!" to execute the call.  The JSON or XML response will be populated in the Response Body, the Response Body will provide you with any relevant codes, and the Request Header URI will show you how the call would be made within your application. Please note:Also, endpoints almost always require a final "/".  You will receive "596 Service Not Found" when it is missing.  An exception to this is for optional methods, such as eventId or teamId.

tags.name: Lacrosse - Schedules, scores, and box scores

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: A teamId returns information for that team only.  If entered, then the conferenceId is ignored.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: Returns information for given conference only.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

tags: Lacrosse - Schedules, scores, and box scores

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all events from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get events for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for games included in the specified eventRound. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason).
  Default - All event rounds

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of country names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get standings for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
 Default - json

get.summary: The participants endpoint provides biographical in...
get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for riders and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, or all teams rosters within the league.

parameters.name: sinceYearLast
parameters.description:
Anyone who last played since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.
  Default - current rosters

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Including a team ID will limit rosters returned to...
get.description: Including a team ID will limit rosters returned to the selected team only.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return roster for one team.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Including a player ID will limit data returned to ...
get.description: Including a player ID will limit data returned to the selected player only.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.

parameters.name: teamId

parameters.name: season

To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId

Events will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns goals).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All game types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Events will be returned for games included in the specified eventRound. Must be used in conjunction with eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason).
  Default - All event rounds

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: decodeType
parameters.description: The data type to be decoded.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
For venues only. Select ID to change language of venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
